## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] New mischief plugin
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines (`npm run lint` passes)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`npm run test:run`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities

## For New Plugins

If this PR adds a new mischief plugin:

- [ ] Plugin has appropriate severity level
- [ ] Plugin references relevant RFC/OIDC/CWE specifications
- [ ] Plugin provides meaningful evidence in the ledger
- [ ] Plugin is documented in plugin-development.md or has inline docs
